official_title: To amend title 39, United States Code, to provide a means by which any municipality may elect to have its name included in all mailing addresses within its boundaries.

summary.text: Directs the U.S. Postal Service, upon the request of a municipal government official, to include the name of such municipality in the mailing addresses for all points of mail delivery within such municipality.

titles.title: To amend title 39, United States Code, to provide a means by which any municipality may elect to have its name included in all mailing addresses within its boundaries.
